title: Where is 'did' used? Give examples. - Quora

response.answer_text: Use did and did not (didn’t) when you want to speak about a past action or event. Did you inform your boss about leaving early? He didn’t know how to respond to the question. Use did in questions and did not (didn’t) in negative sentences and negative questions. Didn’t you promise me that you would come? Note Use a present tense verb after did and did not. Where did you go? Not where did you went?
